events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because the size doesn't fit at all and I wasn't aware of the return policy before buying.
The customer reported issues related to a refund request due to wrong sizing and lack of prior information on the return policy.
Assigned the refund support agent to handle the customer's case regarding the jacket refund inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been used or if the tags are still attached?
Thank you for the quick reply. My order number is 4578123 and the jacket is brand new with all tags intact. I haven’t worn it yet.
We have processed your refund request and you will receive a full refund once we receive the jacket back in our warehouse.
Great, thank you for the help and clear information. I appreciate the quick processing of my refund.
Your refund case is now marked as resolved. Please use the prepaid label we provide to send the jacket back.
Following up to ensure you have successfully sent the jacket back and that you have no further questions related to your refund.
Thank you for confirming receipt of the returned jacket. Your refund has been fully processed and the case is now closed.
